unnormalised: My cousin, Priya Sharma, recently got some genetic testing done at CMC Vellore. Turns out, she has a predisposition to Type 2 Diabetes, something her Dr. suspected. The report highlighted a variant in the TCF7L2 gene. Scary stuff, but now she's prepone-ing lifestyle changes. Cost her around Rs. 8000, but she says it's worth it for the peace of mind. Hoping she can manage it with diet and exercise before it gets to the medication stage.
normalised: My cousin, P-R-I-Y-A Sharma, recently got some genetic testing done at C-M-C Vellore. Turns out, she has a predisposition to Type two Diabetes, something her Doctor suspected. The report highlighted a variant in the T-C-F-seven-L-two gene. Scary stuff, but now she's preponing lifestyle changes. Cost her around rupee eight thousand, but she says it's worth it for the peace of mind. Hoping she can manage it with diet and exercise before it gets to the medication stage.
